metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8805 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ecc_256_modq function in ecc-256.c in Nettle before 3.2 does notproperly handle carry propagation and produces incorrect output in itsimplementation of the P-256 NIST elliptic curve, which allows attackers tohave unspecified impact via unknown vectors, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2015-8803.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8805` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhogweed4 - 3.2-1
libnettle6 - 3.2-1
nettle-bin - 3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nettle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2-1').
